Package com.zoho.arattai.ExtendedClasses

Class AudioClasses

java.lang.Object
com.zoho.arattai.MainClass.MessageClass
com.zoho.arattai.ExtendedClasses.AudioClasses
public class AudioClasses extends MessageClass
Represents an audio message in the chat parser system. Extends MessageClass to add audio-specific properties such as name, size, duration, and type.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zoho Arattai

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • AudioClasses

      public AudioClasses(String audioName, int audioSize, String audioDuration, String audioType, String sender, Long timestamp, MessageType messageType)
      Constructs a new AudioClasses instance with the specified audio properties and metadata.
      Parameters:
      audioName - the name of the audio file
      audioSize - the size of the audio file in bytes
      audioDuration - the duration of the audio
      audioType - the type/format of the audio file
      sender - the sender of the audio message
      timestamp - the timestamp when the audio was sent
      messageType - the type of the message (should be AUDIO)

  • Method Details

    • getAudioSender

      public String getAudioSender()
      Gets the sender of the audio message.
      Returns:
      the sender name or identifier

    • getAudioTimestamp

      public Long getAudioTimestamp()
      Gets the timestamp of the audio message.
      Returns:
      the timestamp in milliseconds

    • getAudioMessageType

      public MessageType getAudioMessageType()
      Gets the message type of the audio message.
      Returns:
      the MessageType enum value

      public String getAudioName()
      Gets the name of the audio file.
      Returns:
      the audio file name

    • getAudioSize

      public int getAudioSize()
      Gets the size of the audio file.
      Returns:
      the audio file size in bytes

    • getAudioDuration

      public String getAudioDuration()
      Gets the duration of the audio.
      Returns:
      the audio duration as a string

    • getAudioType

      public String getAudioType()
      Gets the type/format of the audio file.
      Returns:
      the audio file type

    • getAudioAll

      public String getAudioAll()
      Returns all audio message information as a formatted string.
      Returns:
      a string containing all audio properties including sender, timestamp, name, size, duration, and type
